attachments.title: Philips gives COPD patients a lifeline with new gadget
attachments.text: There are many wearable health-trackers on the market, but few manage to bridge the divide between personal and professional use. Philips today announced the release of a new wearable diagnostic device for

attachments.title: Spire is the first wearable to track body, breath, and state of mind.
attachments.text: Spire goes beyond tracking moments of movement to provide feedback when you're at work, home, and in life. Spire helps you cultivate focus and balance during your day.
attachments.fallback: Spire is the first wearable to track body, breath, and state of mind.
